dmca.title: Twistys complains of copied images
dmca.body:
Dear Legal Correspondent or Designated DMCA Agent 

Our company is the owner of http://twistys.com. This correspondence shall constitute a formal notice pursuant to 512(c) (3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, ("DMCA"). Upon investigation, it appears that your company owns or manages services for http://twistysholly.blogspot.com/. This Website contains infringing images which violate our company's copyright. 
The following Web page(s) contain the images that illegally infringe on our company's copyright: 
All of the following images displayed at 
http://twistysholly.blogspot.com/

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/13.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/00.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/01.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/02.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/03.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/04.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/05.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/06.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/07.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/10.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/11.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/12.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/08.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5371/3144/1600/09.jpg

Demand is hereby made that your company immediately disable/remove this infringing content pursuant to the requirements of federal law If you fail to promptly disable/remove the infringing content, your company will be liable as a contributory infringer under the DMCA. 

I hereby declare under the penalties of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 1746, that: 1) I am the copyright owner or have the authority to act on behalf of the copyright owner; 2) 1 have a good faith belief that the above-referenced images infringe on our copyright; and, 3) the factual representations in this correspondence are true and correct. I also agree that this transaction is governed by the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act CE-Sign Act), 15 U.S.C. 7000, et seq., and adopt the mark below as my electronic signature for purposes of this correspondence. 
Your prompt attention to this matter is appreciated. 

Sincerely, 

[signed]
[private]
cc: [private]@twistys.com
